caption.center: NATHAN J. MACK, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Pinellas County; Richard A. Luce and Pamela A.M. Campbell, Judges.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See DuBoise v. State, 520 So. 2d 260 (Fla. 1988); Shortridge v. State, 884 So. 2d 321 (Fla. 2d DCA 2004); Brown v. State, 827 So. 2d 1054 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002); Allen v. State, 740 So. 2d 1180 (Fla. 2d DCA 1999); Desmond v. State, 576 So. 2d 743 (Fla. 2d DCA 1991); Harris v. State, 789 So. 2d 1114 (Fla. 1st DCA 2001); Woodson v. State, 739 So. 2d 1210 (Fla. 3d DCA 1999).
ALTENBERND, STRINGER, and SILBERMAN, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
